value: 7311 - Advertising Agencies Summary > FORD DEALERS ADVERTISING FUND LIMITED is an Australian public company. Its operations cover advertising agencies. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. FORD DEALERS ADVERTISING FUND LIMITED is headquartered in Fitzroy, Victoria. It is headed by director Cameron Mcleish. For the 2025 financial year, the company reported revenue of $34.73 million. Its net loss totalled $217,000. FORD DEALERS ADVERTISING FUND LIMITED forms part of the services industry sector.
